short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Full classroom control, integration and security right from within your Chrome browser - for ChromeBook, Windows and Mac

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: ClassroomAPP provides the first complete classroom management solution for ChromeBooks, Windows and Macs. Teachers can now enable and push content to students, see their screens real-time and lock them into tests or websites. Comes with webfiltering of bad sites and white / blacklists for teachers to control their student browsing
